name: triennial
description: The event occurs every three years.

name: biennial
description: The event occurs every two years.

name: annual
description: The event occurs once a year.

name: semiannual
description: The event occurs twice a year.

name: three times a year
description: The event occurs three times a year.

name: quarterly
description: The event occurs every three months.

name: bimonthly
description: The event occurs every two months.

name: monthly
description: The event occurs once a month.

name: semimonthly
description: The event occurs twice a month.

name: biweekly
description: The event occurs every two weeks.

name: three times a month
description: The event occurs three times a month.

name: weekly
description: The event occurs once a week.

name: semiweekly
description: The event occurs twice a week.

name: three times a week
description: The event occurs three times a week.

name: daily
description: The event occurs once a day.

name: continuously updated
description: The event repeats without interruption.

name: irregular
description: The event occurs at uneven intervals.

name: unknown
description: The event occurs with unknown regularity.

name: other
description: The event occurs with another type of regularity (for instance, every leap year).

name: twice a day
description: The event occurs twice a day.

name: continuous
description: The item is updated more frequent than daily.

name: never
description: The item is never updated.

name: quadrennial
description: The event occurs every four years.

name: quinquennial
description: The event occurs every five years.

name: hourly
description: The event occurs every hour.

name: decennial
description: The event occurs every ten years.

name: bihourly
description: The event occurs every two hours.

name: trihourly
description: The event occurs every three hours.

name: bidecennial
description: The event occurs every twenty years.

name: tridecennial
description: The event occurs every thirty years.
